products.title: Eternity Linen Blue & Henley Trimmed Roman Blind
products.description: Add a bit of colour and life to your home with this beautiful eternity linen blue roman blind and its coordinated henley trim, with little woollen tassels. ? The eternity linen fabric offers dimout shading - a shade or two short of complete blackout - while the funky pompom trim add a bit of colour and life to your home with this beautiful eternity linen blue roman blind and its coordinated henley trim, with little woollen tassels.

products.title: Evie Lemon Roman Blind
products.description: You might not have heard of the word ogee but it perfectly describes this divine evie lemon roman blind pattern. Picked out in that oh so modern colour palette of grey and yellow this blind will work a treat in your home. The beauty of this design is that it can be modern or trad you might not have heard of the word ogee but it perfectly describes this divine evie lemon roman blind pattern.

products.title: Tiny Rainbows Sunrise Roman Blind
products.description: Light up your little ones space with this gorgeous little number. A bright white, softly textured fabric is adorned with cheerful little rainbows in complementary shades of blue, ochre, umber and mint green, for a joyously vibrant look. Theres practicality here too, with light up your little ones space with this gorgeous little number.

products.title: William Morris Strawberry Thief Velvet Chocolate Roman Blind
products.description: Designed in 1883, william morriss strawberry thief design is timelessly iconic. Part of their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, this charming pattern was inspired by the thrushes morris often caught stealing strawberries from his kitchen garden. The straw designed in 1883, william morriss strawberry thief design is timelessly iconic.

products.title: William Morris Marigold Mimosa Roman Blind
products.description: This beautiful marigold design from their william morris range, in collaboration with the v&a, is the perfect way of bringing the sunshine into your home all year round. Originally designed in 1875, marigold by william morris demonstrates exuberant scrolling foliage and a gent this beautiful marigold design from their william morris range, in collaboration with the v&a, is the perfect way of bringing the sunshine into your home all year round.

products.title: William Morris Compton Velvet Sienna Roman Blind
products.description: Now recognised as the work of john henry dearle who worked with william morris from 1860, compton is a design that is as fashionable now as it was when it was first produced. Part of their william morris collection in collaboration with the v&a, the compton velvet sienna roma now recognised as the work of john henry dearle who worked with william morris from 1860, compton is a design that is as fashionable now as it was when it was first produced.

products.title: William Morris Acanthus Velvet Travertine Roman Blind
products.description: Utterly charming, acanthus is a classic william morris design. Weve teamed up with the talented curators at the v&a museum to create this collection, and this piece really is a treasure from their archive. The acanthus velvet travertine roman blind is the perfect choice f utterly charming, acanthus is a classic william morris design.

products.title: Fairhaven Indigo Blossom Roman Blind
products.description: A delightful floral border pattern, this fairhaven indigo blossom roman blind is a thing of beauty. Picked out in beautiful painterly blues and purples it can be a real showstopper at your window. This blind is ideal for adding a touch of complementary pattern to your decor, it's a delightful floral border pattern, this fairhaven indigo blossom roman blind is a thing of beauty.

products.title: Horizon Stone Roman Blind
products.description: What a stunning ombre design. This horizon stone roman blind does everything right. Blending gorgeous neutral tones to create a graduated watercolour border, it's incredibly contemporary and stylish. How easy it will be to complement this blind with the rest of your decor. Light what a stunning ombre design.

products.title: Horizon Azure Roman Blind
products.description: Ombre patterns are incredibly on trend right now and this horizon azure roman blind executes ombre perfectly. The fading, graduated pattern could easily be a piece of modern art. It successfully blends lots of aquatic blue and green tones to stunning effect and delivers a beautif ombre patterns are incredibly on trend right now and this horizon azure roman blind executes ombre perfectly.

products.title: Horizon Blush Roman Blind
products.description: Add a touch of contemporary style to your home with this stunning horizon blush roman blind. The gorgeous ombre pattern runs from dark to light to create a stunning border across the bottom of your blind. The combination of on trend powder pink and a creamy fabric means you can a add a touch of contemporary style to your home with this stunning horizon blush roman blind.
